segments.content: # This Week In React - Job offer
segments.sourceMdx: # This Week In React - Job offer
segments.translated_content: # React本周动态 - 职位招募

segments.content: Hey, Sebastien from [This Week In React](http://thisweekinreact.com/) here 👋
segments.sourceMdx: Hey, Sebastien from [This Week In React](http://thisweekinreact.com/) here 👋

segments.content: I'm looking for a clone of myself to help me create the content of this newsletter 😄
segments.sourceMdx: I'm looking for a clone of myself to help me create the content of this newsletter 😄
segments.translated_content: 我正在寻找一个"克隆版的我"来协助创作这份简报内容 😄

segments.content: Why would you want to help me?
segments.sourceMdx: Why would you want to help me?

segments.content:
* It is paid correctly
* It can help develop your personal brand
* You get paid to stay up-to-date and become more knowledgeable
* You might want to reach my audience for promoting your own things
* We might have other aligned interests
segments.sourceMdx:
- It is paid correctly
- It can help develop your personal brand
- You get paid to stay up-to-date and become more knowledgeable
- You might want to reach my audience for promoting your own things
- We might have other aligned interests
segments.translated_content:
- 报酬合理
- 有助于建立个人品牌
- 获取报酬的同时保持技术前沿
- 可借助我的读者群推广个人项目
- 我们可能有其他共同兴趣

segments.content:
* is knowledgeable on both React and React-Native
* is able to curate and comment a full issue on their own when I'm not available
* is willing to commit 10-16h of work per issue
* is willing to do this on a long term basis
* is able to communicate clearly and use a simple, concise language
* has a good radar for interesting weak signals, and a good bullshit content detector
* understand the codes of social networks (Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram...) or willing to learn
segments.sourceMdx:
- is knowledgeable on both React and React-Native
- is able to curate and comment a full issue on their own when I'm not available
- is willing to commit 10-16h of work per issue
- is willing to do this on a long term basis
- is able to communicate clearly and use a simple, concise language
- has a good radar for interesting weak signals, and a good bullshit content detector
- understand the codes of social networks (Twitter, LinkedIn, Instagram...) or willing to learn
segments.translated_content:
- 精通React和React-Native
- 能在我缺席时独立完成整期内容策划与点评
- 每周愿意投入10-16小时
- 愿意长期合作
- 具备清晰简洁的沟通能力
- 擅长发现前沿趋势并识别低质内容
- 熟悉社交媒体(Twitter/LinkedIn/Instagram等)传播规律或愿意学习

segments.content: If you can do 80% of what I do, that's ok probably for me, I know I won't find an exact clone of myself 😅
segments.sourceMdx: If you can do 80% of what I do, that's ok probably for me, I know I won't find an exact clone of myself 😅
segments.translated_content: 如果你能达到我80%的水平就足够了，毕竟找到完全复刻版是不可能的 😅

segments.content: We can start small with single week test, then replace me when I'm on off, and then scale and let you write half of the issues if things go well.
segments.sourceMdx: We can start small with single week test, then replace me when I'm on off, and then scale and let you write half of the issues if things go well.
segments.translated_content: 我们可以从单周试合作开始，逐步过渡到代班撰写，最终优秀者可负责半数内容。

segments.content: Interested? Email me at [sebastien+twir-job@thisweekinreact.com](mailto:sebastien+twir-job@thisweekinreact.com) to discuss details.
segments.sourceMdx: Interested? Email me at sebastien+twir-job@thisweekinreact.com to discuss details.
